TopicTitle: KCT crash brings down unity windows with it

Articles.Content:
I force-quit KSP after it hung up.

KCT bugged out.

It caused Unity windows, such as the pause menu and the date reading to go down with it:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Relevant output_log:
